ovdesc.p: A system-maintained work file populated only when SAFECUSTODY.VALUES>PERFORM.ACCRUAL is set to DAILY. At the fee-posting date a record is written to this file. At the end of the charge period, when the fees are due to be realised, this workfile indicates the portfolios due for processing.

desc.p: Date of fee realisation (debit of customer account).
Contains one of three values indicating the record type: SC = Safekeeping fees, DP = Depository fees, IC = Management/Advisory charges.
A compound key consisting of Portfolio Id, Charge Type (SC, DP or IC) and Charge Period End Date.
